parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> TKOH

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Radio and Chat

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Custom Radio and Chat

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set the custom radio channel's call sign. 

Available special parameters:
* $KEY (reference to a localized text)
* %CHANNEL_LABEL
* %UNIT_SIDE
* %UNIT_NAME
* %UNIT_RANK
* %UNIT_ID
* %UNIT_REF
* %UNIT_GRP_NAME
* %UNIT_GRP_LEADER
* %UNIT_VEH_NAME
* %UNIT_VEH_POSITION

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> customChannelID [[radioChannelSetCallSign]] callSign

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> customChannelID: [[Number]] - [[Channel IDs|custom channel ID]] returned by [[radioChannelCreate]] command

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> callSign: [[String]] - custom call sign

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>4 [[radioChannelSetCallSign]] "%UNIT_NAME";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[radioChannelAdd]], [[radioChannelCreate]], [[radioChannelRemove]], [[radioChannelSetLabel]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
